bridge-type.label: Withings API
bridge-type.description: This bridge represents the gateway to the Withings API.

parameter.name: clientId
parameter.label: Client ID
parameter.description: Client ID provided for the application you created

parameter.name: clientSecret
parameter.label: Client Secret
parameter.description: Client Secret provided for the application you created

parameter.name: authCode
parameter.label: Auth-Code (redeem)
parameter.description: Auth-Code received from the OAuth 2.0 grant of the Withings API. Please see the binding README for detailed instructions on how to generate an auth-code. The auth-code is redeemed once (therefore the field is cleared when it could redeemed successfully).
